title: System Font Stack
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of system font stacks in CSS. You will learn how to use native fonts of different operating systems to achieve a more natural app feel and ensure font consistency across devices. By the end of this lab, you will be able to define a system font stack using CSS and understand the hierarchy of font preferences in different operating systems.
